Package controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener
    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener
    Controls the physics aspect of the game.

        public void jump()
        Makes the stickman jump. The acceleration takes into consideration the constant acceleration force and the delta for this simulation step.
        Parameters:
        delta - Duration of the rotation in seconds.
